eLabel.text: Your Set-Top Box Is Shutting Down!

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10, 1), size = (48, 48), png = 2), # index 2 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (68, 0), size = (790, 30), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (68, 24), size = (790, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # index 1 is the state ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 18),gFont("Regular", 15)], "itemHeight": 50 }

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 20) wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] if (64 > wsizey): wsizey = 64 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += 60 if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (40, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (0, 0), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 0), size = (60, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 0), size = (150, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (260, 0), size = (400, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (818, 0), size = (50, 40), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (40, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (40, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 0), size = (60, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 0), size = (150, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (260, 0), size = (400, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (818, 0), size = (50, 40), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 40 }

skin.screen: {"templates": {"default": (95,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (0, 0), size = (100, 75), png = 4), # index 4 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 0), size = (900, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 1 is the Title MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (0, 0), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 5), # index 5 is the Published Date MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 40), size = (350, 22), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 6), # index 6 is the Views Count MultiContentEntryText(pos = (500, 40), size = (350, 22), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 7), # index 7 is the duration MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (0, 0), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 8), # index 8 is the ratingcount ]), "state": (95,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (900, 28), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 30), size = (900, 60), font=3, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 2 is the description ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 18),gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 95 } Format:%a %d. %b %H:%M # fake entry for dynamic thumbnail resizing, currently there is no other way doing this.

Format:%a %d. %b %H:%M {"templates": {"default": (110,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (0, 4), size = (130, 98), png = 0), # index 0 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (130, 4), size = (130, 98), png = 1), # index 0 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (260, 4), size = (130, 98), png = 2), # index 0 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (390, 4), size = (130, 98), png = 3), # index 0 is the thumbnail ]), "state": (110,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 40), size = (900, 28), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 0), # index 0 is the name ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 14),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 110 } # fake entry for dynamic thumbnail resizing, currently there is no other way doing this.

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 20) wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] if (64 > wsizey): wsizey = 64 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += 60 if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (9, 1), size = (48, 48), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (62, 5), size = (858, 30), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 0, color = 0x00ffffff, color_sel = 0x00ffffff), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (62, 30), size = (858, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2, color = 0x00ffffff, color_sel = 0x00ffffff), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (0, 0), size = (638, 0), png = 5), # index 4 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",20),gFont("Regular",16)], "itemHeight": 50 }
